features: Summer’s Eve Spa Feminine Cleansing Wash and Intimate Skin Serum elevate your daily intimate care routine
pH-balanced and gynecologist tested and is safe for sensitive skin
The feminine wash gently cleanses, freshens and leaves your skin feeling pampered
The serum comfortably hydrates, smooths and softens delicate intimate skin
Gift Set contains 1 bottle of Summer's Eve Spa Daily Intimate Wash (12 oz) & 1 tube of Summer's Eve Spa Daily Intimate Skin Serum (1 oz)
body.description: Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Provides long-lasting freshness and leaves your skin feeling pampered Uniquely designed to pamper delicate, intimate skin Next page 1 Wash 2 Serum

How is Summer’s Eve Spa Luxurious Wash different than soap? Summer’s Eve Cleansing Washes are specially designed and extensively clinically tested on the vulva to make sure they align with women’s natural pH range. They are all pH-balanced and Gynecologist-tested. Is Summer’s Eve Spa Luxurious Wash pH-balanced? Our Cleansing Washes are specifically formulated for the delicate skin around your external bikini area. All Summer’s Eve Cleansing Washes are pH-balanced, gentle, free from dyes and parabens, hypoallergenic, & gynecologist and dermatologist tested. How should I use Summer’s Eve Spa Luxurious Wash? Great question! Our Spa Luxurious Wash is for external use only. Simply wet your intimate area, pour a small amount of the Luxurious Wash onto your hand or washcloth, apply and rinse. A serum for my intimate area? The Serum specially designed to hydrate, smooth and soften your delicate intimate skin. Infused with Vitamin E, aloe and coconut oil, our lightweight serum absorbs quickly and is gentle for daily pampering of your bikini and outer intimate area. When should I use Summer’s Eve Spa Serum? The ideal times to use our Spa Serum are after showering, after grooming or as part of your nighttime intimate skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell so nice. Enjoy it
reviews.reviewText: The smell is so nice, enjoy it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant formula! Loving it so far!
reviews.reviewText: The last time I raved about a feminine wash kit, I felt silly a few days later because it didn't work as effectively. After trying out this Summer's Eve wash and serum, what I will say is that I am extremely pleased. I felt fresh all day, despite bladder issues from tons of coughing and sneezing. The wash smells amazing. It's gentle and almost pleasant enough to use as an all over body wash:) There seems to be a generous amount of product in this feminine wash. It's creamy, and not a gel consistency, and I'm mentioning that because I felt like it lasted and I was able to get a decent wash before I rinsed it away. The serum is to be applied after the shower. I rubbed it on with clean hands. The reason for the five star review is the FRESHNESS! I was good to go all day. That really boosted my confidence. NO IRRITATION WHATSOEVER! It didn't cause dryness or itchiness and that, ladies and gentlemen, is a vote of confidence from me! I included the pictures of the packaging to shoutout the company for making sure it was safe during the shipment process. Summer's Eve rocks for this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars FEMININE WASH & HYDRATING SERUM
reviews.reviewText: Summer’s Eve has the best feminine wash and scent. This one has a shimmer I didn't need but it’s pretty to look at. The creamy texture is amazing. I did like the camomile scent. The hydrating serum was not good at all. It comes in a squeeze tube but the serum ball up badly while applying it. Even when I use a thin layer, it doesn't spread. I would only recommend the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Body wash & moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this is a body wash and moisturizer just being marketed as something more. The wash says it’s specifically for in-tim-ate areas. But do we all really use a different wash for just “there”? As a regular all over body wash it works great, it smells nice and lathers good. The serum is to be use on the bikini area. It says after showering, grooming or nightly. It seems like a bikini bump cream to me. It smells faintly of rubbing alc- The 2 products come in a huge box which is really unnecessary. And the price is high in my opinion. If it was around ten dollars I would buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serum Hydrates Delicate, Intimate Skin Areas & Refreshing pH Balanced Wash Cleans Well
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Summer’s Eve combination. The older I get, the more dry my skin becomes. Some areas need a little help—the skin serum is ideal for more intimate places. I’ve tried other brands, and they soothe, but also feel too greasy. This formula is perfect—a combination of vitamin E, aloe and coconut oil hydrate and soften skin without the added greasiness. I appreciate that it’s free of fragrance too. Just a little dab provides a day’s worth of comfort. This product is ideal for middle-aged women like me.The luxurious wash is equally as nice. It’s lightly scented with a fragrance that isn’t overpowering—simply a fresh, pleasant smell. I feel confidently clean after using the wash—it’s pH balanced and made without parabens, dyes or silicones.I’m glad Summer’s Eve makes so many quality products for intimate areas, and at an affordable price--getting this pair as a set is an even better value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: smells good. works great. nice packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice products, but way overpriced to but as a set...
reviews.reviewText: The scent is nice and I really do like the serum, it is very soothing, especially post- shaving.However this is very expensive to buy as a set... the whole point of a set is to maybe get a little bit of a price break, but this is actually more expensive to buy as a set than to buy each product individually. If you add up the current cost of each individual item on Amazon and in retail stores on average it is around $4 more to buy the set! Why???The wash is also more than all the other Summer's Eve washes... almost double the per oz price! I'm not sure there's anything really all that more special about this wash than the others... for some reason they're really proud of this one.So while the products are "nice", the price on this is just not cost effective enough for me to recommend this set. Unless they bring the cost down under probably $16. If you really want to try these, I suggest buying separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer's Eve fan
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Summer's Eve products for years. The biggest difference with this product from the ones you buy at your local store is definitely the creaminess. Its a thicker, more luxurious feeling cleanser than the regular non-cream ones. It smells absolutely amazing. I am a woman who uses more "men's" smelling products so I really like this. Not sweet or fruity smelling. The after shave cream has seemed to help fight against razor bumps in the bikini area. I have used it a few times after shaving and it feels very nice. No burn to the product. I think this is a great set and would definitely buy again.
